bad_request.title: Bad Request
bad_request.detail: The server cannot or will not process the request due to something that is perceived to be a client error

unauthorized.title: Unauthorized
unauthorized.detail: The request has not been applied because it lacks valid authentication credentials for the target resource.

forbidden.title: Forbidden
forbidden.detail: Authentication credentials were provided in the request, but the server considers them insufficient to grant access

verification_required.title: Verification Required
verification_required.detail: An email-based session verification code is required to access this account

authenticator_required.title: Authenticator Required
authenticator_required.detail: A TOTP 2-factor authenticator is required to access this account

reset_required.title: Password Reset Required
reset_required.detail: A password reset is required to access this account

not_found.title: Not Found
not_found.detail: The origin server did not find a current representation for the target resource or is not willing to disclose that one exists.

method_not_allowed.title: Method Not Allowed
method_not_allowed.detail: The method received in the request-line is known by the origin server but not supported by the target resource.

conflict.title: Conflict
conflict.detail: The request could not be completed due to a conflict with the current state of the target resource.

gone.title: Gone
gone.detail: The target resource is no longer available at the origin server and this condition is likely to be permanent.

payload_too_large.title: Payload Too Large
payload_too_large.detail: The server is refusing to process a request because the request payload is larger than the server is willing or able to process.

unsupported_media_type.title: Unsupported Media Type
unsupported_media_type.detail: The origin server is refusing to service the request because the payload is in a format not supported by this method on the target resource.

im_a_teapot.title: I'm a teapot
im_a_teapot.detail: This server is a teapot, it may be short and stout.

unprocessable_entity.title: Unprocessable Entity
unprocessable_entity.detail: The server understands the content type of the request entity and the syntax of the request entity is correct but was unable to process the contained instructions.

too_many_requests.title: Too Many Requests
too_many_requests.detail: The user has sent too many requests in a given amount of time and has been rate limited.

internal_server.title: Internal Server Error
internal_server.detail: The server encountered an unexpected condition that prevented it from fulfilling the request.

not_implemented.title: Not Implemented
not_implemented.detail: The server does not support the functionality required to fulfill the request.
